table.Name: wcms_Help
table.Title: a_menu_help
table.SQL_SELECT_LIST: declare @totalItem int, @totalPage int set @totalItem = ( select count(0) from wcms_Help where Help_LanguageID = @langID AND Help_ParentID is not null { AND Help_Title @Search:Help_Title } { AND Help_Content @Search:Help_Content } ) if (@pageSize < 1) set @pageSize = 15 set @totalPage = ceiling(@totalItem * 1.0 / @pageSize) if (@pageIndex < 1) set @pageIndex = 1 if (@pageIndex > @totalPage) set @pageIndex = @totalPage select [Help_ID] ,REPLICATE('·····', Help_Level - 1) + ' ' + (case when Help_Level = 1 then '' + Help_Title + '' else Help_Title end) as [Help_Title] ,[Help_O] ,case when [Help_A] = 1 then 'checked' else '' end as [Help_A] ,0 as [locked] from ( select top (@pageIndex * @pageSize) ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY {@Sort} {@Asc}) as [num] ,[Help_ID] ,[Help_Title] ,[Help_Level] ,[Help_O] ,[Help_A] from wcms_Help where Help_LanguageID = @langID AND Help_ParentID is not null { AND Help_Title @Search:Help_Title } { AND Help_Content @Search:Help_Content } ) tb where [num] between (@pageIndex - 1 ) * @pageSize + 1 and @pageIndex * @pageSize select @totalItem, @pageSize, @pageIndex
table.SQL_LOAD_EDIT: set nocount on select [Help_ID] ,[Help_ParentID] ,[Help_Title] ,[Help_Content] ,[Help_O] ,[Help_A] from WCMS_Help where Help_ID = @editID
table.SQL_UPDATE_ACTIVE:
declare @id int set @id = @editID
update wcms_Help set [Help_A]= @active where Help_ID = @id select @id
table.SQL_COPY:
set nocount on declare @parentID int set @parentID = {@Get:Help_ParentID}
INSERT INTO WCMS_Help ( [Help_LanguageID] ,[Help_Title] ,[Help_Content] ,[Help_ParentID] ,[Help_O] ,[Help_A] ,[Help_Date] ) VALUES ( @langID ,{@Get:Help_Title} ,{@Get:Help_Content} ,@parentID ,{@Get:Help_O} ,{@Get:Help_A} ,GETUTCDATE() ) declare @id int set @id = SCOPE_IDENTITY()
-- Update HierarchySort exec [SP_A_W_001_UpdateHelpHierarchySort] @parentID
select @id
table.SQL_DELETE: set nocount on delete wcms_Help where Help_ID = @delID select @@ROWCOUNT exec [SP_A_W_001_UpdateHelpHierarchySort]
